message: Let's be fair, 60% for me and 40% for you
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation factor will kick in for me next round.
Considering the inflation, you've lost 10% of the value in the last round and will lose another 10% in this round. I think 70% for me and 30% for you is a good compromise.
I'm willing to accept a 60/40 split, but I'm not going any lower than that. The inflation is hurting my gains too much.
